```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Create a basic map of New Zealand
nz_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = 173, lat = -41.5, zoom = 5)

nz_map
```

```{r}
# Create New Zealand map dataset
nz_pop <- data.frame(
  city = c("Auckland", "Wellington", "Christchurch"),
  lat = c(-36.848461, -41.276825 , -43.53333),
  lng = c(174.763336, 174.777969 , 172.63333),
  population = c(1711000, 440900, 510661)
)

# Create New Zealand map with makers
nz_map_pop <- leaflet(nz_pop) |>
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Voyager) |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(lng = 173, lat = -41.5, zoom = 5) |>
  addMarkers(~lng, ~lat, popup = ~paste(city, "<br>Population:", population))

nz_map_pop
```
